Specific Ingredients: Blue Dragon Reduced Sugar Sweet Chilli Dipping Sauce

Recipe Name: 1. Dice Pepper and Onion into small pieces.
2. Get a bowl and mix together the Sweet Chilli Sauce, Soy Sauce, Worcestershire Sauce, Tomato Puree and 150ml of Water.
3. Cut Chicken into small pieces then mix with 1 Cal Spray, Paprika, Salt, Pepper, etc.
4. Cook Chicken until golden and cooked through.
5. Remove Chicken from pan and add Onions and Peppers allow them to cook until onion starts to brown.
6. Mix all together, best to add Rice, Noodles, Potatoes etc. now.
